Attacks.Name: Tri Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, choose one special condition: Shocked, Incinerate, or Slow. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the chosen special condition.

Attacks.Name: Electro Web
Attacks.Effect: Characters damaged by this attack gain the Rooted special condition until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Flash Cannon
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character cannot add dice to its defense rolls for the rest of the round.

Superpowers.Name: Levitation Matrix
Superpowers.Effect: This character ignores the effects of terrain and other characters when moving. Enemy characters within range 2 roll one fewer die when making collision damage rolls caused by this character.

Superpowers.Name: Magnetic Repulsion
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range. Push the chosen character S. If the chosen character has the Slow or Rooted special condition, instead Push it M.

Attacks.Name: Discharge
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, each other character within range 2 of the target suffers 1 damage and gains the Shocked special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Emergency Overclock
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of this round, add 2 dice to this character's attack rolls. At the end of the round, this character suffers 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Magnezone character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
